title: Flip Time - Before 10am
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the home surface
AND it is before 10am
custom_steps: WHEN the mini-scoreboard is viewed
custom_expected: THEN the previous day default will show (ex. yesterday's date/games)

title: Flip Time - After 10am
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the home surface
AND it is after 10am
custom_steps: WHEN the mini-scoreboard is viewed
custom_expected: THEN the current day default will be seen (ex. today's date/games)

title: Preview link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-scoreboard
AND the game is in the Scheduled state
AND a game is in Preview
custom_steps:
WHEN they hover over the game from web
OR tap the game card on mobile
custom_expected:
THEN a game link for Preview will be seen (Web only)
AND clicking on the link will open the Gameday Preview for that game

title: Gameday link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-scoreboard
AND the game is in the Pre-Game state
AND a game is in Preview or Live
custom_steps:
WHEN they hover over a the game from web
OR tap the game card on mobile
custom_expected:
THEN a game link for Gameday will be seen (Web only)
AND tapping on the link will open the Gameday for that game

title: Wrap link
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-scoreboard
custom_steps:
WHEN they hover over a game in Final on Web
OR tap the game card on Mobile
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a game link for Wrap (Web only)
AND tapping on the link will open the Wrap page in a browser

title: Tickets link (Web only)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-scoreboard
custom_steps:
WHEN they hover over a game in Preview
AND tickets are available
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a game link for Tickets
AND tapping on the link will open the Tickets page in a browser

title: Stream link (Web only)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN they hover over a game that is In-Progress or Archive
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see a stream link (ex. MLB.TV, Apple TV+, etc)
AND they will either be taken to the paywall or the game will start streaming depending on entitlements

title: Cancelled or Postponed (Mobile only)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-scoreboard
AND a game is Postponed or Cancelled
custom_steps: WHEN the game card is tapped
custom_expected: THEN nothing happens (user is not taken to Gameday)

title: MLB.TV - Home Feed
custom_preconds:

custom_steps: WHEN the "MLB.TV" link is tapped
custom_expected: THEN the home team's feed will launch by default

title: MLB.TV - Favorite Team (Home)

GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-carousel
AND hovering over a game with an "MLB.TV" link
AND the user has a Favorite Team set
AND the Favorite team is playing
AND is the home team
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps the "MLB.TV" link
custom_expected: THEN the favorite team's feed will launch by default

title: MLB.TV - Favorite Team (Away)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-carousel
AND hovering over a game with an "MLB.TV" link
AND the user has a Favorite Team set
AND the Favorite team is playing
AND is the away team
custom_steps: WHEN a user taps the "MLB.TV" link
custom_expected: Then the favorite team's feed will launch by default

title: MLB.TV - Followed Team (Home)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-carousel
AND hovering over a game with an "MLB.TV" link
AND the user has a Followed Team set
AND the Followed team is playing
AND is the home team
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps the "MLB.TV" link

(make sure the opposing team is not the user's Favorite Team or a Followed Team ranked higher)
custom_expected: Then the Followed team's feed will launch by default

title: MLB.TV - Followed Team (Away)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-carousel
AND is hovering over a live game
AND the user has a Followed Team set
AND the Followed team is playing
AND is the away team
custom_steps:
WHEN a user taps the "MLB.TV" link

(make sure the opposing team is not the user's Favorite Team or a Followed Team ranked higher)
custom_expected: Then the Followed team's feed will launch by default

title: Click Streaming Broadcaster button (ex. Apple TV+) -WIP-
Preview
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-carousel
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in Preview

custom_steps_separated.content: AND is TBD
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Start Time (i.e. “4:10 PM ET”) will display as start time

custom_steps_separated.content:
AND is TBD
AND is a Doubleheader
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN “TBD” will display as start time

custom_steps_separated.content:
AND is NOT TBD
AND is a DoubleHeader
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN  “Game [gameNumber]” (i.e. “Game 2”) is displayed as start time

custom_steps_separated.content: AND is in PreGameDelay
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Append dictionary label game_status_delayed after start time, TBD, or Game # (i.e. “7:10PM ET - DELAY”) is displayed

title: Live
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a game is Live

custom_steps_separated.content: AND is NOT in Warmup
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Inning State (i.e. “TOP 1”, “BOT 6”, “END 8”, etc.) in top left of cell is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: AND is in Warmup
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN "WARMUP" is displayed in the top left of the card

custom_steps_separated.content: AND is Suspended
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN dictionary label game_status_suspended after Inning State (i.e. “TOP 4 - SUSPENDED”) is appended

custom_steps_separated.content: AND is In Game Delay
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN dictionary label game_status_delayed after Inning State (i.e. “TOP 4 - DELAY”) is appended

custom_steps_separated.content: AND is in Instant Replay
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN dictionary label game_status_replay after Inning State (i.e. “TOP 4 - REPLAY”) is appended

custom_steps_separated.content: AND is in Manager Challenge
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the dictionary label game_status_manager_challenge_short after Inning State (i.e. “TOP 4 - CHALLENGE”) is appended

custom_steps_separated.content: AND is in Umpire Review
custom_steps_separated.expected: Append dictionary label game_status_umpire_review_short after Inning State (i.e. “TOP 4 - REVIEW”)

title: Final
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the home surface viewing the mini-scoreboard
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in Final

custom_steps_separated.content: AND is Cancelled but is NOT Postponed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Final is displayed in the top left of the card

custom_steps_separated.content: AND has gone in to extra innings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the final inning (i.e. “FINAL / 10”) is appended

custom_steps_separated.content: AND is Cancelled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN "CANCELLED" is displayed in the top left of the card

custom_steps_separated.content: AND is Postponed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN "POSTPONED" is displayed in the top left of the card

title: Perfect Game / No Hitter
custom_preconds: GIVEN a use on the home surface viewing the mini-guide
custom_steps: WHEN the game is a No hitter or a Perfect game

custom_steps_separated.content:
AND  is Live
AND is Suspended
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Inning State will be hidden
AND the shortened label game_susp_short is used instead of game_status_suspended (to avoid label conflict)

custom_steps_separated.content:

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN  Inning State is hidden (to avoid label conflict)

custom_steps_separated.content:
AND is Live

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game_status_umpire_review_short label is not displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
AND is Final 
AND has gone extra innings
AND is NOT Cancelled
AND is NOT Postponed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN game_status_final_abbrev is used to avoid label conflict (i.e. “F/10”)

custom_steps_separated.content:
AND is Final

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game_canc_short is used instead of game_status_cancelled (to avoid label conflict)

custom_steps_separated.content:

custom_steps: WHEN there is a malformed URL or the URL is unable to load for whatever reason
custom_expected: THEN the user should see an alert or other messaging stating that there is a problem with the URL

title: "Done" Button  Functionality - Push Notifications
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user receives a push notification that opens up a News story
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the news story 
from any  notification
custom_expected: THEN the Done button will take the user back to the default view

title: Player Card - Push Notification
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a notification for a news article that includes a player link
custom_steps:
When the user opens the notification
AND tap on the player link
custom_expected: THEN the Player card should present modally on top of the story, without dismissing the article below it

title: Player Card - X button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a webview article from the News index
custom_steps: WHEN the user tap on a player link in the webview article
custom_expected:
THEN the player card opens in a modal on top of the article 
and it includes an "X" button to close the modal

title: Scroll Indicator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
- Device setting is on dark mode
- the user is on the News Index
custom_steps: AND the user taps on an article and scroll
custom_expected: THEN the scroll bar on articles in dark mode does not appear in black color but appears in light color

title: Loading indicator (Low connectivity)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on low connectivity environment
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on an article from the Home Tab News index
custom_expected: THEN Loading indicator should appear before every article load

title: Offline/Airplane Mode and Refresh Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has low connectivity and cannot load an article
OR the user has their device in Airplane mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user has a stable connection
custom_expected:
THEN a refresh button will be available to tap on 
AND tapping on the refresh button will load the article again for viewing

title: Share Functionality Within Article
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user taps on the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the News Index
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is viewing the webview article
AND there is a Share button available to tap on
custom_expected:
THEN the share tray will be visible
AND the user is able to share the content to their desired platform

title: Localization (Spanish ES)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user's device language settings is set to ES (Spanish)
AND the user taps on the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the news index and article
custom_expected: THEN both the News Index content and article should load successfully in Spanish

title: Dark/Light Mode Support
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has their device in Light Mode
OR the user has their device in dark mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the News Index and taps on an article
custom_expected:
THEN the user's device Dark/Light mode should be respected
AND the article should be displayed based on their preferences

title: Free/Not Logged-in Users - Ads
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a free user that is not logged in 
AND the user is viewing an article within the Home Tab News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the article on Home Tab
custom_expected:
THEN an advertisement should be visible at the top of the article
AND an a preroll ad should play before video begins playback within article

title: Free/Logged-in Users - Ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a free user that is logged in 
AND the user is viewing an article within the News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the article
custom_expected:
THEN an advertisement should be visible at the top of the article
AND an a preroll ad should play before video begins playback within article

title: MLBALL Users - Ads
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in with an MLBALL
custom_steps: WHEN the user views an article within the News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: MLBALL (Anonymous) Users - Ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled with MLBALL (via in-app purchase)
but has not logged in to the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user views an article within the News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: MLBAUDIO Users - Ads
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in with an MLBAUDIO account
custom_steps: WHEN the user views an article within the News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: Single Team Users - Ads
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in with a Single Team account
custom_steps: WHEN the user views an article within the News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: Team Page - Short Content
custom_preconds:
Given user is viewing a team page
and is viewing the News section of the team page
custom_steps:
When there is a short-content article 
(title usually starts with "Video Story")

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user launches the article directly from the team page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the article will launch in Safari, instead of the webview

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps "See All" to view the whole team news index
and launches the article from the index
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the article will launch in Safari, instead of the webview

title: Team Filter
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the News index
custom_steps:
When the user taps the team filter at the top
and selects a new team
custom_expected: Then the newly selected team's news index will load

title: Home Feed - Video Carousel thumbnail
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN User Navigates to HomeFeed
custom_expected: Display the video title below the thumbnail

title: Tapping on a video thumbnail
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: When user navigates to the Home Feed Top Highlights
custom_expected: Tapping on a video thumbnail plays the selected video in the playlist view

title: Top video one is the most popular on the playlist
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: When user navigates to the Home Feed Top Highlights
custom_expected: All videos below the one playing at the top of the playlist view are in the most popular index for the selected team or MLB

title: Video time and date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a User on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN a video thumbnail is tapped
AND the Videos page opens
custom_expected: THEN the video's runtime and date display directly under the video title

title: Carousel  Scrolls - Analytics
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user scrolling the video carousel on the Home page
custom_steps: WHEN each thumbnail is snapped
custom_expected:
THEN the following data will be logged to Adobe:

trackAction: MLB App : Home Feed : <clubAbbreviation> : Content Carousel : Carousel Scroll
action.element.index: <the index of the carousel element to which the user snapped>
action.element.text: <the visible text of the carousel element to which the user snapped>
action.element.sectionIndex: 0
action.element.sectionTitle: "Top Highlights"

title: Carousel Content Clicks - Analytics
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Home page video carousel
custom_steps: WHEN content is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN data similar to the following example will be logged to Adobe: 

trackAction:	MLB App : Home Feed : MLB : Top Highlights : Content Card Click			
action.element.index:	0			
action.element.sectionIndex:	0			
action.element.text:	Legendary managers join Reynolds			
action.element.video.slug	/legendary-mangers-join-reynolds

title: Webview Articles
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the News Index
custom_steps: When the user taps a news article from the index
custom_expected: Then the article will launch in a webview

title: Loading Indicator
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the News Index
custom_steps: AND the user taps on an article
custom_expected: THEN the user should be shown a loading indicator (progress bar) prior to the article being displayed

title: Article Title Header - News
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a webview article from the News index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the header of the article
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the word "News" displayed in EN
AND the word "Noticias" in ES 
AND the article title will not be displayed in the header

title: Removal of Tab Bar when viewing articles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user taps on the News section
AND taps on an article in the News index
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the article
custom_expected: THEN the Tab Bar will not be visible to the user while viewing the article
